content: I have an oauth2 server on my main site. I want to do an oauth2 sign-in from the main site to the chat site using zulip. When a member signs into chat; if they are not registered in zulip it should register them and sign them in. I have looked at the documentation but have no idea where I am suppose to place any oauth2 client in zulip. I have poked around in the directories figuring since evil google was built in that I could learn something that way. No luck. There is nothing in the documentations about oauth2 that I could find. A few pointers in the right direction to get me started, please.
@Jerianobe Bebe replied in the other thread where you posted this.
In general, please only post a question in one place.
